website_summaries.verdict: The Panasonic Lumix DMC-ZS10 is a very good compact megazoom, as long as you don't mind paying more for features and speedy performance than photo quality.
pros: The Panasonic Lumix DMC-ZS10 has fast shooting performance and an extensive feature set
cons: The Panasonic Lumix DMC-ZS10 has a near-pointless touch screen

website_summaries.verdict: An impressive set of specs including a 16x zoom lens, a high-quality touch screen, GPS, and 3D image capture, canâ€™t compensate for the  subpar image quality and low-light performance you get with the Panasonic Lumix DMC-ZS10.
cons: Poor overall image quality and low-light performance
Slow to start up and shoot

customer_reviews.title: BEST 16x GPS camera even in 2018.
customer_reviews.text: 7 years on, and this camera is still the ONLY 16x zoom with GPS. Period. It has not been replaced or upgraded by anything better. If Panasonic were smart, they would release a new version like the DMC-ZS100 but BRING BACK THE GPS for geotagging. OR, use a bluetooth-paired phone for it and embed the EXIF header with the GPS data.
customer_reviews.author: B. Wxup

customer_reviews.title: Great Pocket Camera
customer_reviews.text: We've been Canon users for years but I dropped our Canon pocket camera and killed it. My wife said "Let's get the kind of camera Peggy uses!" So we asked Peggy and she gave us the info on this camera. There are updated versions now, but we are tickled to death with this camera! I still have my Canon "hang around the neck" camera for more challenging shots, but I find I don't carry it as often if wife has this one along!
customer_reviews.author: Bob Siefker

customer_reviews.title: Does not resist corrosion
customer_reviews.text: While this camera was still under warranty, the lens barrel stopped functioning, and would not focus, retract, or extend. I sent it in for service, and was told it would take about a week to repair. Three weeks later I received a phone call stating that the camera had corrosion inside and the warranty was void. The camera was never exposed to rain and never immersed. I do, however, live a couple miles from the beach, and the humidity is often high. Seems that was enough to ruin the camera. I would warn anyone who lives in a humid area to avoid this product.
customer_reviews.author: Barry A. Wells

customer_reviews.title: Easy use and always nice photo!
customer_reviews.text: I am not a professional photographer but ZS10 always takes great and beautiful photos! Almost everyone who sees me using this camera taking photos is amazed by the beauty of the picture. Update (04/12/2012): I broke this camera last week and I am bidding a used one in Ebay! I love this one so much that I can not wait to get another! :) Update (04/25/2012): I won the bid for a blue ZS10 in Ebay for $155 (plus a carry case and 8G Card, so I did not do too bad! :) The camera still amazes me! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: A Phillies' Fan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent point and shoot camera
customer_reviews.text: Excellent point and shoot camera. However, it is a tad too big. No viewfinder is bad. I know, viewfinder is rare breed these days.
customer_reviews.author: bigpig

customer_reviews.title: My third generation of the Lumix; one of three in this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best for wide angle (24 MM). And a great zoom! (x16). Can do video. This generation is faster recovery, great for room and elevation pix, and a better placement of dial control, and on and off location. Easy to change flash to the needs of the moment. One added item they no longer send is the soft-sided carry pouch.
customer_reviews.author: DannySea

customer_reviews.title: I love the camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera has an awesome zoom you just can't beat. Takes wonderful pictures. Love the 10 picture mode when your taking pictures of a group. GPS also included. You can take a picture by tapping the back lends of the camera. It also has back touch screen. Fits snug in your pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Ruthann

customer_reviews.title: my pocket pal
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for a couple years now. Thought of buying a Leica but went with just the lens mounted on a Panasonic body. Great photos, great battery life. The 3d feature is cool and operating the video is really simple
customer_reviews.author: Keith Alan

customer_reviews.title: Camera is good.
customer_reviews.text: The opening to the battery slot broke and unable to repair or get the company to advise. Camera is good.
customer_reviews.author: billy gilbreath

customer_reviews.title: Very good camera.
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes great pictures and the 16x zoom brings things up close. Also the built in GPS is very handy disclosing your location and location of pictures taken. It is light weight and easy to take anywhere, but you must keep it in some kind of case when not taking pictures because dust can get inside of lens. If it had a viewfinder, it would almost be the perfect camera for the traveling person.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie D Hinson

customer_reviews.title: Great camera like new to replace my old one
customer_reviews.text: I loved this camera for underwater photograpy with a housing I bought separately. My ZS10 developed a spot on the pictures from some oil inside the camera. Buying this like new model was less than repairing my old one, and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Bill in Colorado

customer_reviews.title: unstable performance and unacceptable low-light image quality
customer_reviews.text: This camera has all the great features but eventually I am frustrated with low quality on low-light settings such as the sunset and indoor scenes that I like to photograph. The zoom in function with focus is not always accurate and frustrating to use. Most images look ok on the screen but I am a picky person on image quality and I can't stand the image noise that is so noticeable! So I had to return it and get cannon which has better image quality.
customer_reviews.author: econiche

customer_reviews.title: Do the Firmware 1.2 update!
customer_reviews.text: I just bought the ZS10 to replace a ZS5 that someone lifted out of my coat pocket in a Moscow train station. I noticed there is a firmware update at Panasonic to fix the reported picture quality issue. I have installed it but haven't tested it yet. Someone else has, and they have posted before/after pix here: [...] I still miss the RAW capability. But I like these little babies, the zoom is great for travel photos.
customer_reviews.author: David Chaika

customer_reviews.title: Love my new Panasonic Lumix
customer_reviews.text: This is my third camera. I use to own a Sony but it died in a year and a half. Then I bought an Olympus but flash pictures were horribly grainy. This Panasonic Lumix is awesome. Great pics and videos. No real flaws to speak of yet.
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: Terrific camera
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this camera. My first digital camera was a Panasonic and I preferred to stay with the brand. Received order on the earliest day promised; all items listed as included with the camera were in the box. No problems or complaints.
customer_reviews.author: JeanieB

customer_reviews.title: A Perfect Little Travel Companion
customer_reviews.text: I was very suprised to see all the great features of this High Tech camera. A great Leitz zoom lens and I wonder "how they managed to get this zoom in as little over one inch body width". Lots of settings for special shots. Good GPS, but the software should be updated to include more sites and special places, important for people who do a lot of travelling. A second battery is necesary and battery life is not all that bright. All together "great value" and I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Udo

customer_reviews.title: the only way to go...
customer_reviews.text: I love all my lumix cameras, each time they upgrade it , I buy the new one and give the old one to my kids....they love them to.
customer_reviews.author: Reverend Cliff

customer_reviews.title: Greatest Zoom Ever
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera, but suspect that the 24X may be partly digital zoom rather than all optical. Just haven’t taken the time to analyze it. It’s such a fun camera to use, I don’t think I’ll ever utilize all the amazing features available on this super great camera.
customer_reviews.author: Jim-Phoenix-AZ

customer_reviews.title: 5th version of this camera I've owned
customer_reviews.text: Love it this last time ordered it and the canon equivalent. Chose this one because it's slightly better. wider wide and better menus
customer_reviews.author: Cadillacrazy

customer_reviews.title: COOL
customer_reviews.text: NICE SERVICE, NICE ITEM, ALL GOOD AND RECOMENDABLE!! THEY SHIPPED BEFORE THE DEADLINE AS I ASK CUZ I WAS IN A RUSH.
customer_reviews.author: Engel

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful camera for the price. It takes great telephoto photos. Objects from a great distance can be obtained and still retain clarity.
customer_reviews.author: true review

customer_reviews.title: Could not ask for better.
customer_reviews.text: The pictures are just great, sharp, no blur with movement, the colors are very true, the zoom is fantastic. The battery doesn't drain as quickly as I thought it would with the gps always on. Easy to operate. The menu is very intuitive. Knowing that Leica and Panasonic worked on the technology makes me believe this will be a very good camera for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry K.

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera with Awesome Zoom but no Mac software
customer_reviews.text: Great compact camera with a 16X optical zoom that extends up to 30X when using 7MP resolution! Good picture quality. Unfortunately it comes with PC software only so I could not extract AVCHD videos to my MacBook on the road. Also the the intelligent mode does not not allow you to change anything (exposure, white balance etc).
customer_reviews.author: Theizzy

customer_reviews.title: big zoom
customer_reviews.text: The camera's zoom is pretty amazing, I took photos of dragonflies and you can clearly see their big round eyes looking back at the camera. Pretty amazing zoom on this little camera.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: awesome camera!
customer_reviews.text: Great camera! I got this for a concert I went to and it took pretty good photos. I've always been a fan of Panasonic.
customer_reviews.author: bryan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent zoom and fast operation
customer_reviews.text: Very impressive optical zoom. Startup time and shutter speeds nice and fast, nearly instant. Image quality is great and the videos are great too. All-in-all an impressive camera at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: MIke D.

customer_reviews.title: love this camera
customer_reviews.text: best deal for the price point. this is my second lumix. only quirky thing is that it's easy to accidentally take photos if using the touch screen mode - not the worst thing really. otherwise, an awesome camera on all levels.
customer_reviews.author: nikoniko

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to complain about image quality and HD video. Great optical zoom! However, it's compatibility with Mac OS is limited. Photos download ok with iphoto. But videos can be downloaded, seen and edited only with imovie. You can't download videos with iphoto nor can find the videos when exploring the camera with the finder. Only imovie can do that.
customer_reviews.author: chadid

customer_reviews.title: Amazing camera
customer_reviews.text: I had one before but abused it badly. Great in all fields except bouncability! I have the underwater housing too and get some good pictures for the price.
customer_reviews.author: G. Dowling

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Used overseas and the GPS was great to have, worth every penny would use more if I didn't have a camera on my I phone.
customer_reviews.author: Russ Delk

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended, complete, and looks & works like new
customer_reviews.text: Only had it a day, but the first photo taken indoors reported connecting with 4 GPS satellites and gave a very accurate location in geotagging my photo as I require.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley D. Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camer. This camera is a replacement for my ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camer. This camera is a replacement for my 8sz. I hope this one will last longer. I loved the old one I'm sure i will love this one also
customer_reviews.author: roger cox

customer_reviews.title: Very poor image quality. The worst camera I've ever had.
customer_reviews.text: Nice features, but very poor image quality. My older dmc7 takes better pictures. For dark pictures, the thing gets worst. I wouldn't recommend this item. I did lost many good moments taking horrible pictures with this crap. Don't buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Forlane

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing camera. Picture quality, zoom, and ease of use is great. Buy it! You will not be dissappionted.
customer_reviews.author: Salt & Pepper

customer_reviews.title: In Focus
customer_reviews.text: I love the camera so far. Only used it a few times. I love the zoom and especially the wide angle feature. The price was good also.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Nixon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little camera--but takes  "big" pictures
customer_reviews.text: Performs like more expensive cameras. Wish I had purchased it long ago. One gets a lot of "bang for the buck in this little gem
customer_reviews.author: D. Hummel

customer_reviews.title: Great camera and great price!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely recommend this camera, is very good and the size is awesome! Is worth it for the price I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Saavedra

customer_reviews.title: Great photos AND video
customer_reviews.text: We could not be more pleased with the photo and video capabilities on this camera. Other than being a little ackward to get the videos to play back on the camera (which are beautiful) and having to reset my computer resolution and the video still being a little jerkey because of my media version, it has worked like a charm. We took it to Disney instead of our bulky camera and it did everything we needed it to do and then some. We used the IA setting. Digital zoom is better than most but not perfect. I would definately recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Gnat

customer_reviews.title: Excelente
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful camera, reliable, I came in perfect condition .. The excellent color clarity is worth this release. For people who still do not understand how this technology works and how good or bad is, they have to make the camera see in this super .. Rating 100%
customer_reviews.author: PEDRO MIGUEL PEREZ MEZA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this camera takes amazing photos and videos for its size and cost!
customer_reviews.author: mbmd

customer_reviews.title: zoutendr
customer_reviews.text: This camera is perfect for me. It replaces an earlier Lumix model. It is easy to use and performs well. The refurbished unit is completely satisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: zoutendr

customer_reviews.title: Lumix DMC-ZS10 - Handy and Powerful
customer_reviews.text: Lovely little camera for the pocket with great features and good quality pics and video - I wish the various menus were more intuitive but for the price it is a gem.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Monteleone

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: The camera is a great value for the price. I am not good with all the modern equipment they have out today, but found this camera easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: James Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: We have found this camera to be easy to use for the amateur photographer. Takes great pictures. We have found the touch screen to be sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Just a Fantastic Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is beyond my best expectations, it corrects for human deficiencies in focus, camera movement and exposure. The optical zoom is ipressive, but it is the other features that will win you over very quickly. Bought one for me and the day after it arrived bought anothe for my wife. Superb product and a great value.
customer_reviews.author: John W. Heard

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice camera producing good quality pictures, Just so many options. Is better than point and shoot but not as good as the $300-400 cameras
customer_reviews.author: sped mom

customer_reviews.title: lumix ZS10 camera
customer_reviews.text: I own an earlier model Lumix digital camera and this one does everything it does; many are easier to do.
customer_reviews.author: peter d banwell

customer_reviews.title: Very good camera, but...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera, no cons at all, BUT, unfortunately it came without the CD that includes the software to improve the photos and make panoramic pics. As I bought to be delivered to a friend in NY, I just found out about the disc a month later, when he handed the camera to me. The best part is that the Panasonic don't have the software for download in its website.. If I want it I'll have to Buy it. This is very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Tato

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product. Advancing technology made it pretty much outdated by now, but still takes great pictures. Not planning on buying another camera for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Lech Kotecki

customer_reviews.title: I love the Lumix camera line
customer_reviews.text: Its still too new and I haven't used it alot but it has some very cool features that weren't on my old one.
customer_reviews.author: G. Junge

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera. The only negative thing is that the battery runs out very quickly when GPS is on. I use it without GPS and get great photos.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic Lumix DMC-ZS10 Great Camera!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd Panasonic Lumix Camera. They are great camaras for their price range and size. The first one was stolen in Las Vegas, the second got sand on it at the beach and now the lens will not open or close. If you take them to the beach keep them dry and away from sand!
customer_reviews.author: Metro Exteriors, Inc.

customer_reviews.title: Excelente compra
customer_reviews.text: A Lumix DMC-ZS10 reune tudo que fotógrafo amador pode querer de um equipamento e muito mais. As funções automáticas facilitam a vida de quem quer apertar um botão e obter uma excelente foto, além de permitir diversos ajustes manuais para quem entende mais de fotografia. Possui também a interessante opção de GPS, que marca o local das fotos tiradas e também pode ser utilizada para gravar filmes em Full HD.
customer_reviews.author: Marcos A. Oliveira

customer_reviews.title: My 4th Lumix
customer_reviews.text: Starting out with the TZ5 I now have the TZ9 and TZ10 More features on the TZ9 and TZ10 but I have been very pleased with the these three.. I also have TZ3 however for some reason it is non functioning but rather than concern myself about a big repair bill I will retire it to a drawer. and not use valuable time worrying about it. On the other hand should the Panasonic company desire to due a post mortem on the camera without incurring any expense on my part and as courtesy repair it. I would be agreeable..
customer_reviews.author: Leon Photo

customer_reviews.title: no viewfinder
customer_reviews.text: The camera is very good but the fact that it does not have a viewfinder makes it very difficult for me to frame my pictures. Taking pictures in bright sunlight is impossible for me with this camera and I am very upset that I bought it for this reason. For the price it should have this feature.
customer_reviews.author: Judi

product_meta.title: Panasonic Lumix DMC-ZS10 14.1 MP Digital Camera with 16x Wide Angle Optical Image Stabilized Zoom and Built-In GPS Function (Black)
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackFROM THE MANUFACTURER
 
The LUMIX ZS10 features a versatile 24mm ultra-wide-angle and powerful 16x optical zoom LEICA DC VARIO-ELMAR lens. It's MOS sensor enables full-High Definition 1920x1080 video recording capability. And high speed burst shooting up to 10 frames per second at full resolution. A new, large, 3.0-inch, 460,000-dot Smart Touch Intelligent LCD which allows for Touch Zoom, Touch Auto Focus (AF), Touch Shutter, and Touch Playback. The LUMIX ZS10 also features a built-in GPS (Global Positioning System) function allowing geotagged images to be pinpointed via online maps and easily shared with friends and families. 

24mm Ultra Wide-angle 16x Optical Zoom LEICA DC Lens
The compact, versatile lens system is the hallmark of LUMIX ZS series and now this lens system is totally redeveloped for the DMC-ZS10 in both optical and mechanical design. The new high-quality LEICA DC VARIO-ELMAR lens system is even more versatile with 24mm ultra wide-angle* to powerful 16x optical zoom (35mm camera equivalent: 24-384mm). Comprising 12 elements in 10 groups, including an ED lens and 3 aspherical lenses with 6 aspherical surfaces, this advanced lens unit suppresses chromatic aberration which tends to occur in telephoto shooting. It also boasts a short total length of lens unit despite its higher versatility with longer zoom range, which is made possible by development of a new mechanism for the structure of lens barrel. The lens system is also compatible with high shutter speed of min.1/4,000 sec. 

* Converted to standard 35mm camera equivalent, at the maximum wide position.



Venus Engine FHD
For the image processor, the Venus Engine FHD is incorporated that features exceptionally advanced signal processing capabilities. By separating chromatic noise from luminance noise and applying the optimal noise reduction to each, you can capture clear and beautiful images even when shooting at high ISO sensitivity levels. The Venus Engine FHD also provides precisely selective noise reduction to the chromatic noise without affecting the border of colors which is judged from the brightness level of a pixel. Linking smoothly with the MOS sensor, the Venus Engine FHD processes a large amount of signals at high speed, making it possible to record high resolution consecutive shots and full HD movie recording. 

Large, 3.0-inch, 460,000-dot High-resolution Smart Touch LCD
The DMC-ZS10 large 3.0-inch Smart Touch LCD features a high 460,000-dot resolution, and a wide-viewing angle allows you to zoom, Auto Focus, release shutte and playback with the touch of a finger. The big screen reflects fine details, making it easy to check the focus before shooting. It also serves as a small photo and video viewer, allowing you and friends to enjoy viewing the still and motion images together.










 3D Photo Mode
The newly added 3D Photo Mode* produces a 3D image in the camera. The image-processing method used by LUMIX records beautiful images with less distortion or visible image links. The camera takes 20 panning shots and automatically selects the two most suitable images, one for the right eye and one for the left eye, to synthesize a 3D composite. The 3D image can be viewed on a VIERA 3D HDTV. The 3D image format is compatible with MPO, so it can be played back on other MPO-compatible equipment such as TVs and digital photo frames, or printed.



Touch AF Tracking Subject Detection
Once the AF subject is selected by touch control, it continues to track the subject even if it moves until you press the shutter. When you're taking images of active children, pets, sports scenes or subjects in a moving object, this function eliminates the need to press the shutter button halfway down repeatedly to readjust the focus. The Touch AF Tracking makes sure you don't miss those once-in-a-lifetime shooting opportunities.

POWER O.I.S. (Optical Image Stabilizer) Shake Detection
Everyone has had an experience of taking a photo at night and hoping to capture all the memories and beauty, only to be disappointed at the poor result. Panasonic has worked on the low-frequency vibration hand-shake component, which is physically generated when pressing the shutter button or when shooting at night with a slow shutter speed. The POWER O.I.S. (Optical Image Stabilizer)* nearly doubles the hand-shake correction power of conventional MEGA O.I.S. You get bright photos without blurring even from handheld shooting at slow shutter speeds. * The POWER O.I.S. is automatically turned on in the iA Mode and can be turned on or off in the P/A/S/M Mode or some Scene Modes.



Intelligent Scene Selector - Scene Detection
With the camera in the iA Mode, the Intelligent Scene Selector automatically sets the Scene Mode Scenery, Portrait, Macro, Night Portrait*1, Night Scenery, Sunset or Intelligent Handheld Nightshot*2. The camera judges it from the various detection results such as focusing and brightness level of the circumstance*3. You are free from changing settings every time the scene changes when taking images with these Scene Modes to get beautiful results.
*1 In the iA Mode, the Night Portrait is not identified when the flash is turned off.
*2 The Intelligent Handheld Nightshot Mode must be turned ON in the menu prior to use.
*3 With some subject and shooting conditions, it is just not possible to judge the best shooting details. When this happens, it is recommended that you shoot with the Scene Mode that best suits your purpose.



iA (Intelligent Auto) Mode
When you don't know which mode will give you the best shooting results, or when a sudden photo opportunity pops up and you don't have time to change settings, simply choose the iA (Intelligent Auto) Mode and let the camera do it all for you. Just choose the iA Mode, aim at your subject, and shoot. Four detection and correction functions are simultaneously activated to optimize the settings, so you get stunning photos every time.

GPS with Place Name and Landmark Information
The LUMIX GPS displays not only latitudes and longitudes, but also the area information that covers 203 countries or regions and the landmark information of over 1,000,000 locations in 82 countries or regions. This function allows geotagged images to be pinpointed via online maps and easily shared with friends and family.



LUMIX Image Uploader
The DMC-ZS10 gives you a new form of communication by letting you share your photos and movies. All you have to do is checkmark the photos and movies you want to share and connect the camera or SD/SDHC/SDXC Memory Card to a computer. Uploading automatically starts by simply following the guidance.* Facebook can be used for photos and YouTube for movies. You can join these social networking services without having to install any special software. It's easy to share photos and movies on the spot, which means that your friends don't have to wait for you to come back home to see them. 


* LUMIX Image Uploader starts up automatically on the computer the supplied software "PHOTOfunSTUDIO Ver. 6.0" or later is installed.
In other case, start up the menu by double-clicking the file "LUMIXUP.EXE" in the folder below:
[My Computer] > [Removable Disk] > DCIM > AD_LUMIX (Windows)
* YouTube is a trademark of Google Inc.
* Facebook and the Facebook logo are registered trademarks or trademarks of Facebook, Inc.



3D Image Viewer / VIERA Link
Photos or movies recorded in AVCHD on the SD/SDHC/SDXC Memory Cards are easy to view on a Panasonic VIERA TV. Simply insert the card into the VIERA Image Viewer (SD/SDHC/SDXC Memory Card slot) on VIERA TV or DIGA Blu-ray Disc Player to playback your content. Alternatively, you can use an optional HDMI mini cable to output the still and motion images you took from the DMC-ZS10 directly to the TV for VIERA Link. Most of the control is possible using only the TV's remote control. Especially, the pictures taken with the 3D Photo Mode via the 3D Image Viewer offering users a whole new exciting experience.

What's in the box

Camera 
Battery Pack 
Charger 
Stylus Pen 
Hand Strap 
USB Connection Cable 
AV Cable 
CD-Rom
feature_bullets: Powerful 16x Optical Zoom: The DMC-ZS10 features a powerful 16x optical zoom lens (35mm camera equivalent: 24-384mm)
Touch Zoom Function: The touch-screen operation on the DMC-ZS10 makes zooming even easier.
Burst Shooting Mode in Category Playback
Sonic Speed AF: The Sonic Speed AF system includes numerous re-engineering enhancements

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars141 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
